item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-31
item.description: Samsungâ€™s leaked Galaxy S22 Ultra is just straight up a Galaxy Note now (2 minute read) A newly leaked official render of Samsung’s Galaxy S22 Ultra shows a device that is pretty much a Note in every way except for its name.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-30
item.description: Boston Dynamics unveils Stretch: a new robot designed to move boxes in warehouses (4 minute read) Boston Dynamics has unveiled a robot called Stretch that is designed to move boxes in warehouses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-24
item.description: Elon Musk reveals Boring tunnels as he aims to eliminate city traffic (3 minute read) Elon Musk has revealed renders of the first commercial station being built by his tunnel-digging company.
